oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Harlan Howard Written Song Recordings - Tape 5
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The series of recordings features a variety of tracks written by Harlan Howard. The tracks are performed by a variety of artists including: Harlan Howard, Leon McCauliffe, Stonewall Jackson, Jim Reeves, Jan Howard, Floyd Tillman, Pat Zill, Jan Howard, and Burl Ives. The tracks are from a variety of unidentified dates. The tape is the fifth in a series of eight.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Harlan Howard
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Pretty Good Shape (For the Shape I'm in) (Harlan Howard) -- (02:43) Cozy Inn (Leon McCauliffe) -- (05:28) The Water's So Cold (Stonewall Jackson) -- (07:59) I Never Pass There Anymore (Jim Reeves) -- (10:29) I Won't Forget You (Jim Reeves) -- (12:24) Belle of the Ball (Jan Howard) -- (14:52) Empty Glass (Floyd Tillman) -- (16:46) I Can't Stand it (Harlan Howard) -- (18:55) Little Lies Make Big Heartaches (Pat Zill) -- (20:46) In My Heart (I'm Still Married to You) (Jan Howard) -- (22:57) Beautiful Anna Belle Lee (Burl Ives)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Howard, Jan (Vocalist); Howard, Harlan; McCauliffe, Leon; Jackson, Stonewall; Reeves, Jim; Tillman, Floyd; Zill, Pat; Ives, Burl, 1909-1995;
